about:
Hi there, my name's kat808. But most ppl call me kat. I'm an adventurer and will never leave a match without a kill. I get along with most ppl, except for freakin' spawn killers, I hate them -_-
hate.....them. WHY? Because one day I was minding my own biz when along came 6 spawn killers going at me all match until I got saved when they got kicked. That's my story. They got like ALOT of kills out of me......alot.         


^-^ luv ya
